Translations.Text: huwa alladhi khalaqa l-samawati wal-arda fi sittati ayyamin thumma is'tawa ʿala l-ʿarshi yaʿlamu ma yaliju fi l-ardi wama yakhruju min'ha wama yanzilu mina l-samai wama yaʿruju fiha wahuwa maʿakum ayna ma kuntum wal-lahu bima taʿmaluna basirun
lahu mul'ku l-samawati wal-ardi wa-ila l-lahi tur'jaʿu l-umuru
yuliju al-layla fi l-nahari wayuliju l-nahara fi al-layli wahuwa ʿalimun bidhati l-suduri
aminu bil-lahi warasulihi wa-anfiqu mimma jaʿalakum mus'takhlafina fihi fa-alladhina amanu minkum wa-anfaqu lahum ajrun kabirun
wama lakum la tu'minuna bil-lahi wal-rasulu yadʿukum litu'minu birabbikum waqad akhadha mithaqakum in kuntum mu'minina
huwa alladhi yunazzilu ʿala ʿabdihi ayatin bayyinatin liyukh'rijakum mina l-zulumati ila l-nuri wa-inna l-laha bikum laraufun rahimun

wama lakum alla tunfiqu fi sabili l-lahi walillahi mirathu l-samawati wal-ardi la yastawi minkum man anfaqa min qabli l-fathi waqatala ulaika aʿzamu darajatan mina alladhina anfaqu min baʿdu waqatalu wakullan waʿada l-lahu l-hus'na wal-lahu bima taʿmaluna khabirun
man dha alladhi yuq'ridu l-laha qardan hasanan fayudaʿifahu lahu walahu ajrun karimun
